title: You have to lock in picks and bans
body: Before we get started i am aware this is completely my own fault but I now have a 30 minute queue time because I forgot to lock in my champion two times now, not to mention the other 5 or so players I've seen in the past few pre-game lobbies do the same thing. I mean surely if you pick a champion this is a good indication you want to play or are not afk right?

replies.body: How dumb can you be? :P You had to lock in the old champ select, what on earth makes you think you don't have to in the new one? It even has a popup box telling you to lock in ffs.

you never HAD to lock in at all, lock in was just to speed up the process. in earlier versions you can just select a champion then when the timer hits 0 it automatically locked in, not kick you from the lobby.

As I stated I'm aware this is my fault. It's just that some games are unclear on where your teammates are going so I never use to lock-in and now I've made myself a bad habit because you have to lock-in in the new champion select.

Yeahh happened to me this morning, i was in queue for 13 minutes then didn't realise you had to LOCK after selecting a champ and now i have a 6 minute timer. surely a pick is an indicator that your there....
well, if a pick is an indication that your there, it isn't hard just to click Lock In, is it?
It's to speed up the champion select process. I'm sure you'll get used to it before long :)

I HAD TO WAIT 20 MINS FROM LEAVER BUSTER NOW I HAVE TO WAIT ANOTHER 30 MINS ALL BECAUSE I DIDNT OWN YASUO AND I COULDNT FIND HIM WHEN IT WAS MY TURN TO BAN. plz riot games i dont want to suffer these long waits anymore
2 things; search function is your friend. Also, if you can't find him then it means nobody on the enemy team owns him...
They need to change it, 4 games in a row people have forgot to lock in, its so stupid.
